CatDescriptText: Related image published in advertisement in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 10, 1960, pg. 15, with text reading: "Now open the magnificent Jones Funeral Home - An exterior view of the Jones Funeral home and some of the crowd at the Grand Opening on Sunday, Dec. 4. Beautifully Designed and Decorated with Imported Lighting Fixtures and Modern, by Dignified Furnishings Worthy to Express the Deepest Emotions.  Wylie Ave. at Francis St., 24-Hour Service, Samuel J. Jones, Funeral Director."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of men and women, standing outside of Jones Funeral Home for grand opening, Wylie Avenue, Hill District
